node.text:
• • • • •
We teased you yesterday, but no more monkeying around…here’s the recipe for Monkey Punch!

This tasty cocktail recipe has been created by Erik Lorincz from Kwānt, No.47 in The World’s 50 Best Bars 2019, with Monkey Shoulder whisky. Will you be giving it a try?

𝐈𝐧𝐠𝐫𝐞𝐝𝐢𝐞𝐧𝐭𝐬
25ml Monkey Shoulder
25ml Calvados
10ml Mezcal
10ml oloroso sherry
50ml oat milk
5g zatar
15g demerara sugar 
Garnished with floregano •
Video by @50bestbars
#tw50bc #theworlds50bestcocktails
#Worlds50BestBars #50BestBars #Cocktail #Bar #London #Recipe #CocktailRecipe #Bartender #UK #whisky @monkeyshoulder @kwantlondon @eriklorincz

.

.

node.text:
𝑻𝒉𝒂𝒏𝒌𝒔 𝒕𝒐 🍸 @anthonygaleno 

SMOKED DATES⁠ 

40ml  Bourbon⁠
40ml Graham’s Port 10 Years Old⁠
15ml Dates Syrup⁠
dash Angostura Bitter⁠
dash Lime Juice⁠ 

Recipe © - @justshakeorstir⁠
Photography © - @georgippetrov⁠ 

Stir all the ingredients over ice, then strain into a Spey Whisky Glass @urbanbaruk over 1 large ice block. Add smoke for instant infuse with a smoking gun. This cocktail was smoked with Bourbon Soaked Oak Wood Chips. Garnish with Physalis berry & dry dates.⁠
.

𝑻𝒉𝒂𝒏𝒌𝒔 𝒕𝒐 🍸 @cocktailswithlele 

THE CORN FLIP - Cocktails with Lele Menu 2020 

INGREDIENTS:
50ml whiskey 
15ml creme de cacao 
10ml popcorn syrup 
3 drops mole bitters 
1 whole egg 

Method: Shake 

Glassware: coupette 

Garnish: Popcorn
.

node.text:
𝑻𝒉𝒂𝒏𝒌𝒔 𝒕𝒐 🍸 @sideshowpete_ 

Contrast can create excitement and few drinks are as bold as this. With lime coming in the nearly clear and deep red of pomegranate this cocktail is visually enticing. Once your mouth gets there, you will be sold. This is the Pom Thumb. A sipper with gin, lime juice, simple, and a bit of pomegranate juice floated on top. A drink you are sure to love.⠀
.⠀
👍🍹Pom Thumb🌿🍹⠀
2 oz gin⠀
1 oz lime juice⠀
1 oz simple syrup⠀
1 oz Pomegranate Juice⠀
.⠀
Mix gin, lime juice, and simple syrup into a shaker with ice. Shake well to chill and strain over fresh ice. Float the pomegranate juice on top, garnish and serve. ⠀
.⠀
Through April 30,2020, Sideshow Pete has committed 100% of ALL PROFITS to the US Bartenders Guild. Check out the link in our Bio. Buy the book 101 Ways to Amuse/Abuse a Bar-Fly (shipped directly to your door) or download from Amazon, Cocktails: Classics to Complex. Help us help the industry people that are out of work. Another way to help, donate directly to the USBG.⠀
.⠀
Stay in, stay healthy, stay positive!

node.text:
𝑻𝒉𝒂𝒏𝒌𝒔 𝒕𝒐 🍸 @servedbysoberon 

MIST OVER JALISCO
- 45ml/1.5oz Reposado Tequila
- 15ml/0.5oz Mezcal Espadin
- 10ml/0.33oz Campari
- 10ml/0.33oz Cointreau
- 22,5ml/0.75oz Lime Juice
- 15ml/0.75oz Passionfruit Syrup
- 2 mists of Absinthe
- - - - -
HOW: Mist your glass with Absinthe once / Shake all other ingredients with crushed ice / Dirty dump / Top with more ice / Mist Absinthe a second time / Garnish.
- - - - -
The past years, due to the success of The Mandalorian, it has been Grogu/Baby Yoda who was getting all the love 💕 but what about the OG Yoda? Let's not forget him, shall we?🤭 So here's him standing in half a Passionfruit. Not that it has much to do with the cocktail... 🤪 but oh well 🤷‍♂️!
.
In the glass you get some kind of 'Passionfruit Margarita' that's enhanced with a splash of Mezcal and Campari for good measure.🍹 But what really stands out is that the entire drink is embraced by a fine veil of Absinthe.🧚‍♂️ By first misting the inside of the glass and then the top of the drink, it hints of it at all times, yet without it ever being the dominant flavor.🔥 Ah, the wonderful world of balance ☺️.
.
Drinkstagram ❤️ here's to lovely complex sips, with or without lightsaber-wielding Jedi Masters on top (but who would ditch poor Yoda, right? 😜)
- - - - -

𝑻𝒉𝒂𝒏𝒌𝒔 𝒕𝒐 🍸 @cocktailpete 

Yeah yeah it sounds dramatic 😂 but no harming grenades today 😉 instead a pleasing sour, where I pairred whisky and brandy for the base 👍 green apple syrup and grenadine for the sweet part 🍏 lemon juice for the sour counter part 🍋 and fluffy egg white on top 🥚 enjoy 

The 🍹 English grenade 

45 ml whisky english
15 ml apple brandy
25 ml fresh organic lemon juice
10 ml green apple syrup
10 ml grenadine
egg white 

Pour all ingredients in a shaker and give it a hard shake 🕺 add ice 🧊 shake untill chilled ❄ double strain into a chilled glass ❄ garnish with dehydrated lemon 🍋 and freezedried apple 

Cheers 🥂 Skål

•
🇬🇧 
Truffle Boulevardier :
•
I had this Maker's Marks Fatwash with Truffle Oil in my bar for a long time and had the idea to try it on a Boulevardier!  The truffle really brings something new to this cocktail while keeping the recipe and the spirit of this classic!
If you want to try your own Fatwash follow the process in my permanent stories ! 
•
- 45ml Bourbon Maker's Mark Fatwashed with Truffle Oil @makersmark 
- 22,5ml Campari @campariofficial 
- 22,5ml Carpano Antica Formula Sweet Vermouth @carpanoantica 
•
Method : Stirred
Garnish : Orange Zest 🍊
•
Clear Ice By : @icecube_co 🧊
•
•
•
🇫🇷 
Truffle Boulevardier :
•
J'avais ce Maker's Marks Fatwash à l'huile de truffe dans mon bar depuis longtemps et j'ai eu l'idée de l'essayer sur un Boulevardier! La truffe apporte vraiment quelque chose de nouveau à ce cocktail tout en gardant la recette et l'esprit de ce classique!
Si vous voulez essayer votre propre Fatwash, le processus complet est expliqué dans les stories permanentes! 
•
- 45ml Marker's Mark Fatwash à l'huile de truffes @makersmark 
- 22,5ml Campari @camparifr 
- 22,5ml Carpano Antica Formula Vermouth @carpanoantica 
•
Méthode : À la cuillère 
Garnish : Un zeste d'orange 🍊
•
Clear Ice par : @icecube_co 🧊

node.text:
𝑻𝒉𝒂𝒏𝒌𝒔 𝒕𝒐 🍸 @mythologyandmixology 

The Legend of Mezcal tells of the generous goddess, Mayatl. The Zapotec goddess of mezcal was cold and unfeeling until maguey worms burrowed into her heart and became trapped there. Through these burrows, she began to experience arousal, desire, and one day, love. She fell in love with a brave and handsome warrior named Chag. He did not feel worthy of the goddess. In her desperation, she offered him to drink the luxurious elixir that poured from her heart. He drank and drank until he drunkenly declared, “make me a god or become a woman” ... and that’s where the legend ends. ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
•⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
•⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
I don’t think anyone needs an excuse to have a mezcalita, but today, we CELEBRATE! 🇲🇽⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
Left to right:⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
💚 Honeydew Mezcalita⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
🤍 Pineapple Jalapeño Mezcalita⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
❤️ Prickly Pear + Blood Orange + Watermelon Mezcalita⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
I made all with @ilegalmezcal and fresh fruits. Salud!
